items.title: After Canada legalized cannabis, police caught more drunk drivers
items.description: When Canada legalized cannabis in October 2018, there were many concerns about its potential impacts. One of them involved cannabis-impaired driving.

items.title: Doctor's orders? 'Belly laugh at least two to five days a week'
items.description: Melanin Bee curves her spine like a stretching cat as she lets out a maniacal, forced laugh.
